title: Lunar Revel 2016 - "Show me the path [to info]!"
body:
http://s.lolstatic.com/site/skins-lunar-revel-2016/84dc8777c5119dbffbe18aa2b1091d078c56f453/images/wallpaper/Triptych-Wallpaper-2339x1080.jpg

Hey all!

We know that there is a [ton of information out there about the Lunar Revel event](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207331576) and there might be some confusion.  The following information should help out and clarify the more finer details of the promotions we have going on:

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

> #***Lunar Revel Mystery Gifting***

* Available from January 26th, 08:00 PST to February 8th, 23:59 PST
* Must be Level 10 to send Mystery Gifts to friends. You can read the full requirements in our [Mystery Gifting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ).
* The double chance for Legendary Skins and Lunar Revel Skins applies both to normal Mystery Skin gifts as well as the Mystery Skin Chests!
* The following Lunar Revel Skins are part of the double chance (Includes 2016 Lunar Revel skins as well!):
 * *Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere, Warring Kingdoms Jarvan IV, Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao, Warring Kingdoms Nidalee, Warring Kingdoms Katarina, DragonBlade Riven, Dragon Fist Lee Skin, Dragonblade Talon, Dragonwing Corki, Jade Dragon Wukong, Panda Annie, Jade Fang Cassiopeia, Firecracker Jinx, Guqin Sona, Lunar Goddess Diana, Lunar Wraith Caitlyn, Lunar Wraith Morgana, Radiant Wukong*

> #***Your Unique Lunar Revel Shop***

* Available starting on January 28th (exact time to be determined) through February 8th, 23:59 PST!
* ***Don’t panic if you see less than 6 deals!***  If you own enough content that the shop cannot provide you 6 unique deals, it will simply provide less deals.
* The following content will ***NOT*** be provided in the deals:
 * [Limited Skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins#h2)
 * [Legacy Skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins#h1)
 * Champions/skins released within 90 days of Lunar Revel’s launch

> #***Firecracker Jinx Merch Figure and free Summoner Icon***

* [Available starting at February 1st!](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/) (exact time still to be determined)
* In order to qualify for the free Summoner Icon, the figure needs to have been purchased by February 8th, 23:59 PST (if not sold out earlier)
* The free Summoner Icon is ***NOT*** a new icon, and is the Firecracker Icon (consistency!) from Lunar Revel 2015
* After purchase, both the confirmation page and the confirmation email will include the specific steps needed to redeem the icon to get it on your account
 * You have 14 days from the time of purchase in order to redeem the icon. If you go to your order status page, you can see an exact days remaining for the unlock.
 * The icon can ONLY be redeemed in the region the figure was purchased from.  For example, if you purchase it from NA, it can only be redeemed on NA.
 * If you forgot which account you unlocked the icon for, you can check your order status page to double-check.

> #***Skins and Summoner Icons***

* The following content is considered ***legacy***, and will go back into the vault and be no longer available after February 8th, 23:59 PST
 * Lunar Wraith Caitlyn (*1350*RP)
 * Lunar Wraith Morgana (*975* RP)
 * Rising Dawn Ward Skin (*640* RP)
* The following content will permanently remain in the store even after the event:
 * Radiant Wukong (*1350* RP)
 * Monkey King Summoner Icon (*250* RP)
 * Nightshade Serpent Summoner Icon (*250* RP)
 * Shadow Wolf Summoner Icon (*250* RP)
 * Lunar Guardian Summoner Icon (*250 RP* or *1500* IP) *Icon will only be available for RP after the Lunar Revel event ends.*

replies.body: It's already 28th of January, patch 6.2 is live, but where is Lunar Revel shop!!! I'm dying to see my sales! ><
The Lunar Revel Shop should be live already!  If you are still not seeing it, make sure to reply back and let me know!
At first the button for my shop was there and I clicked it, but it only loaded the backdrop, no deals. I rebooted the client and now the button isn't even there. 10:30 pm CST
Same exact thing happened to me.

Hey there, I loaded the client after patching about 15 minutes ago. When I opened the client I got a message saying the following: "There was an error processing a message from the server, this may be caused by a number of issues so it is recommended you restart your client. If it continues to occur please visit support.leagueoflegends.com with a description of the error and what you were doing at the time." Now when I log in there is no lunar shop. Please help : D
Hi, Im having the same problem. I'm dying to see the Lunar Revel shop, can u fix that asap please
it isnt showing up for mine

When I logged in today, i saw my shop, clicked it... Nothing loaded.  Then I restart my client to see if it was a bug, and there's no longer a lunar revel shop.

I restarted my client multiple times, and there is still no Lunar Revel shop available on my account.

replies.poster: n u t b o i
replies.body: Still cant see my Lunar Revel Shop, BibleThump
Still no Lunar Revel Shop for me send help rito pls
no shop here. my wallet is in one piece, why?

Hey, loaded up client at about 8:20 PM~ ish PST, and Lunar Revel Shop never appeared in client.
Not entirely sure if it'll help but here is a screen
http://imgur.com/V9vQy2j
gonna try to repair client in case that might fix it, will reply if it fixes anything
Same problem. No Lunar Revel shop ;-;
I still don't see my shop :(
I can't seem to find my lunar revel shop either
Hi hi! Im having the same problem. I can't find my Lunar Revel shop :c
I didn't get my shop either, Riot fix this please ;-; {{item:3070}}

Just to provide an update for everyone, about 17 hours ago we noticed a problem where the Lunar Revel store was not appearing to some players.  We had all hands on deck and resolved it as quickly as we could.

It should be completely resolved now, but let us know if you keep seeing any issues and we'll make sure to check on it!
The Lunar Revel discount shop disappeared for me as well.  It was there a few hours ago and now gone...
Hello, I am having the Lunar Revel shop difficulties too. Can you please do something about it? I tried to restart my client thousands of times. I don't know what to do.{{item:3070}}  {{champion:32}}

Hey dartagnan. Im having a problem for 6.2 patch and you wrote an article and i went thru that .
that was absolutely useless. the whole point of what you wrote was just basically "wait for the client to precess"
and you didnt even let ppl to leave comments ?

Please do something bout "Karnel pvp net stopped working" error. im getting this error after every single patch and ive literally tried everything.

I did leave a note at the top saying I would unlock the patch notes once the patch is live, but I am waiting for NA to get patched up.

For your specific Kernel error though, this is typically a type of OS Permissions issue.  The best steps you can take to resolve this is completing all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)!

Hope this helps!
Why isn't Lunar Wraith {{champion:51}} at sale ? Can anyone explain ?

Hmm....From looking at the store, I see her being sold at 1350 RP

Is she appearing at a different price for you?  Reply back and let me know!

Dobre means on sale for 975, like previous 1350 RP skins have been. The answer to that is the change to skin sales announced here: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

So 1350s (and ultimate skins) no longer will have a release sale, but will instead go on sale 4-6 months after release. I'm not sure what will happen for legacy skins, which ordinarily wouldn't be in the shop in 4-6 months. Might you be able to shed some light on what the plan is for those?

Legacy skins won't be on sale in 4-6 months, since they'll be in the legacy vault. I'm not sure what plans would be once they come back the following year/come out of the vault. In the pat, returning content has only been available on sale via bundles.

I hope they'll eventually be on sale individually. It would feel kind of weird for the bargain-seekers out there if the cheapest price one can get Lunar Wraith Caitlyn individually for is the same as the cheapest price for Dragon Tamer Tristana!

i would like to know about the legacy skins sale as well. Seem like an unfair thing not to put Lunar Wraith Caitlyn on a small discount when it's going back to the vault and possible not be seen again until the next Lunar Revel event. Are they going to bring it back after 4-6 months to put it on sale?
Thanks a lot for the explication ^_^
Can some1 explain me why i didn't get any lunar discount either ? pls pls :/ i want to spend some moneeeeey
If you didn't get any discounts and your store has no deals, it appears that there isn't enough un-owned content to be put on sale >.<
ever since early sales, skins release dont have the sale on release anymore
It's already 5 pm pst and I didn't see Lunar revel mystery gift in gift center, so is the normal mystery means lunar revel mystery gift?
That is correct!  There is no special Lunar Revel Mystery Gift, the double chance modifier affects the existing Mystery Gift and Mystery Chest for skins.

I can't buy 1 skin from personal lunar revel shop. The offer is for champion graves + skin for -70% discount. When I click to purchase, it says "An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later." It's been like that for 3 days. Can you please check it out Riot. Thank you.
My store won't load an I told them an it still won't work. Waste of RP it seems like
Yeah, mine won't load either. I've tried from a couple different computers and still cannot access my deal. Hope riot acknowledges this problem so people don't get screwed over.
Still same problem for me. Yours fixed?

My lunar revel skin shop gave me a lee sin skin even though I don't own lee sin, and have more that enough champions for it. Just wondering if this is a bug or if the system is allowed to give me skins for champs I don't own?
My lunar shop is there but won't load I've tried for 2days. But all my friends can use it. I even tried a different computer. Sme problem it's quite annoying I wanted my blitz skin...

Error: AN unexpected error has occured. Please check back again later.

??? it was working just fine a few minutes ago and it just stopped{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Hey I got Dragonblade Riven for the shop at 40% but it got removed 1 game after cause it is legacy, will you guys be able to put it back on, I mean, she is available right now so It doesn't make any sense to get it removed...
Can you gift champions/skins that are in your Lunar Revel discounts page?
No, those deals are for you specifically.  Sorry :(
My Lunar Revel Shop link has disappeared too, what's causing this to happen to everyone omg
Hello Riot, like the others i didn't have this Lunar Revel Shop, so i want to know what is happening if am i doing something wrong, i try to reset but didn't work, so please tell what is going on?

I opened up the Lunar Revel discounts in the League client. I got exactly who I was looking for (Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere! whooho. Now I have all of my favorite champs skins!) . I went and got some RP. Re-opened up League and he was GONE! I had to RE-activate another discount in Tryndamere's spot. lol. All the Lunar Revel discounts I activated this morning are still there , except for Tryndamere, what's up with that?
Happened to my mafia jinx and another skin. i was gonna get the mafia jinx skin too cause it was a good deal, but then it changed to blood moon thresh. fml
